sn22.19:1.3: The cause and condition that gives rise to form is also suffering.
sn22.19:1.4: Since form is produced by what is suffering, how could it be happiness?
sn22.19:1.9: The cause and condition that gives rise to consciousness is also suffering.
sn22.19:1.10: Since consciousness is produced by what is suffering, how could it be happiness?
sn22.19:1.12: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
